item: Microwave equipment, fuse panel and DC converters, properly installed and labelled as per the IWO
Power, Rack Ground, Alarm, IF cables labelled end-to-end with flag tags properly connected
MW Hop configured with desired RSL and the MMU-H is labelled with RSL values
Back of the MW Chassis labelled end-to-end hop identification. Only applies to standard shelter installation with rear frame access (not for WICs)
MW test results are left on site USB
